title: Calculating ventilation requirements
fullText:
The minimum ventilation size required for each of the high and low venting requirements in Clause 5.4.11.3 Items (a) and (b) is calculated by the following formula.
A = K × Ah × I 5.1
where
A = the minimum area of vent in square millimetres
Ah = total amp/hour (Ah) of battery or battery bank
I = the maximum available charging current in amperes
K = nominal bank voltage
Values for constant (K): 12 V = 0.0534 (K)
24 V = 0.1068 (K)
48 V = 0.2136 (K)
